participant_1.background:
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
i am six feet tall.
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
i like to wear red shoes also.
I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.

participant_2.background:
I have very few memories of my childhood.
I don't play sports because I enjoy spending my time outdoors filming wildlife.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
i like to eat the skin of the apple.
i like tailgate parties.

content.text: Hey! I'm six feet tall, and I love vintage clothing!
Hi! I don't play sports because I like to spend my time outdoors filming wildlife.
That's so cool! I do like to watch nature documentaries.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
Oh no, that's too bad! I used to be in a choir too, but I just stopped singing because I got bored.
I've never been to a tailgate party! What's it like?
It's really fun! People cook food and drink beer and watch football.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to go to one sometime!
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll keep that in mind.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
